parameters.name: UseAnchorPoint
parameters.description: True to insert the bend table at the sheet format anchor point, false to insert it at the point specified by the X and Y parameters of this method

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X-coordinate for placement of the bend table; valid only when UseAnchorPoint is false

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y-coordinate for placement of the bend table; valid only when UseAnchorPoint is false

parameters.name: AnchorType
parameters.description: Anchor type as defined in swBomConfigurationAnchorType_e

parameters.name: StartValue
parameters.description: Starting datum tag; a value from A to Z for letter tags; a positive integer for number tags

parameters.name: TableTemplate
parameters.description: Full pathname of the template (e.g., install_dir \ lang\ language \ bendtable-standard.sldbndtbt )

title: IView.InsertBendTable
description: Inserts a bend table for this drawing view.
signature:
BendTableAnnotation InsertBendTable( 
   System.Boolean
UseAnchorPoint
,
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Int32
AnchorType
,
   System.String
StartValue
,
   System.String
TableTemplate
)

parameters.name: UseAnchorPoint
parameters.description: True to insert the bend table at the sheet format anchor point, false to insert it at the point specified by the X and Y parameters of this method

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X-coordinate for placement of the bend table; valid only when UseAnchorPoint is false

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y-coordinate for placement of the bend table; valid only when UseAnchorPoint is false

parameters.name: AnchorType
parameters.description: Anchor type as defined in swBomConfigurationAnchorType_e

parameters.name: StartValue
parameters.description: Starting datum tag; a value from A to Z for letter tags; a positive integer for number tags

parameters.name: TableTemplate
parameters.description: Full pathname of the template (e.g., install_dir \ lang\ language \ bendtable-standard.sldbndtbt )
